com.qtplaf.library.database.providers

Class XMLDatabaseProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.database.providers.XMLDatabaseProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseProvider

    public class XMLDatabaseProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseProvider
    An XML database provider organized in a file per each field, table and view, to allow for a lazy read instead of having to read huge database definition file.

    Files are organized under a parent directory, with one directory for fields, one for catalogs, under it one for each catalog, under them one for schemas, under it one for each schema, and under them one for tables and one for views.

    • parent_folder:
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
